abstract: Pfizer is acquiring a small Pennsylvania start-up developing experimental treatments for Type 2 diabetes. Pfizer said yesterday that it would buy BioRexis Pharmaceutical, which has 50 employees and two key drug compounds in early testing, for an undisclosed amount.
lead_paragraph: Pfizer is acquiring a small Pennsylvania start-up developing experimental treatments for Type 2 diabetes. Pfizer said yesterday that it would buy BioRexis Pharmaceutical, which has 50 employees and two key drug compounds in early testing, for an undisclosed amount.
